name: RE-EVOLV
description:
Made as part of the brackeys game jam 2020

RE-EVOLV is an action platformer where you are constantly de evolving into an ape as a result of a crazy science experiment gone wrong.

Act fast unless you wanna be an ape for the rest of your life xd

The blue meter is the de evolution timer

When you de evolve your speed increases but attack damage decreases so employ more evasive strategies in the last two stages (like the jump attack which  unlocks in the last two stages). 

There are 4 stages

you can also climb up trees in the last two stages

Play in FULL SCREEN MODE if you are having graphic issues
